    • Method Detail

      • addShutdownHook

        public static Thread addShutdownHook​(ThrowingRunnable<Exception> hook)

        Registers shutdown hook on Runtime.getRuntime(). Equivalent to:

        
 Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread() {
     public void run() {
         try {
             // code
         } catch (Exception e) {
             e.printStackTrace();
         }
     }
 });

        But much shorter:

        
 XRuntime.addShutdownHook(() -> {
     // code
 })
